 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְרָב‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==battle, war== (hostile ***approach***; Aramaism = <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְרָב‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Bn 175</sup>); — abs <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Zech.14.3|Zech 14:3]] +; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְרָבוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.68.31|Ps 68:31]] — \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְחָמָח‎</span> [[Job.38.23|Job 38:23]]; [[Ps.144.1|Ps 144:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יוֺם ק‎</span> [[Zech.14.3|Zech 14:3]]; [[Ps.78.9|Ps 78:9]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלֵיק‎</span> [[Eccl.9.18|Eccl 9:18]] ***his heart was war*** [[Ps.55.22|Ps 55:22]] (see 19 see √ **Qal 1 a**); plural [[Ps.68.31|Ps 68:31]] people that delight in ***battles***; — [[2Sam.17.11|2Sam 17:11]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּקִרְבָּם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Vg|ᵑ9]] [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] and most.
